data.name: Slogan
data.value: We export the elegance of nature to the world for distinguished projects.

data.name: AboutText1
data.value: R&Y Stone Export is a foreign trade company built on a deep-rooted family tradition in marble export, centering on quality and trust. Thanks to our knowledge based on more than 20 years of experience in the sector and our strong organizational structure, we deliver high-standard Turkish marble to many points of the world today. The trust, sustainability, and meticulousness brought by being a family business, combined with our professional working approach, always allow us to offer our customers the right product at the right time. We manage all processes from production to packaging, from loading to shipment transparently, based on international quality standards.

data.name: AboutText2
data.value: Our vision is to establish long-term and strong business partnerships by promoting Turkey's natural stone potential on a global scale. Our mission is to stand by our customers at every step with the principles of high quality, reliable delivery, and strong communication. As R&Y Stone Export, we do not only export marble; we build value, trust, and long-term business relationships. We aim to provide sustainable contributions to our business partners through the innovative projects we develop.

data.name: HomeDescription
data.value: R&Y Stone Export is a foreign trade brand built on family values, basing its marble exports on quality, trust, and continuity. With over 20 years of sector experience, we meticulously select Turkish marble and add value to prestigious projects worldwide by managing all processes from production to shipment at high standards.

data.name: LetsBringProjectsToLife
data.value: Let's Bring Your Projects to Life

data.name: ContactFormDesc
data.value: Fill out the form and we will get back to you.

data.name: ProjectsSubtitle
data.value: Our latest completed projects and their stories.

data.name: ProjectsDesc1
data.value: How to extend the life of your natural stones by protecting them from acidic cleaners? Here are tips from the expert.

data.name: ProjectsDesc2
data.value: Is white Carrara marble or dark colored granite fashionable in kitchens this year? The choice of interior designers.

data.name: ProjectsDesc3
data.value: The story of white gold spreading from Italy to the world, extending from Michelangelo's David statue to the present day.

data.name: FooterDesc
data.value: We carry the art created by nature over millions of years to your modern living spaces. The address of quality, aesthetics, and trust.

data.name: NaturalStoneWarning
data.value: Natural stone products may show variations in color, pattern, and veining due to their nature; this is a result of the product's natural origin.

data.name: CustomProductionNote
data.value: Our products can be produced in custom dimensions and with desired surface treatment options according to customer demand.
